response.overview: Tupac Amaru Shakur, raised by his mother: Afeni Shakur, was surrounded by uprising in the face of discrimination from a young age. This documentary explores his meteoric rise to fame, and the troubles he faced that eventually lead to his untimely death. Now in 2023, new information has surfaced and flipped the case on its head - will the mystery finally be solved?
response.title: Who Killed Tupac Shakur?
